H0.text: Reward system is the system that addictive drugs affect.

H1.text: The digestive system is the system that addictive drugs affect.

H2.text: The honor system is the system that addictive drugs affect.

H3.text: Checks and balances is the system that addictive drugs affect.

A4.text: Addictive drugs and behaviors are rewarding and reinforcing (i.e., are addictive) due to their effects on the dopamine reward pathway.
